*Qingqing District, Hefei (青春社区) *Zhennan, Hefei (镇南社区) *Zhenxi, Hefei (镇西社区) *Zhenbei, Hefei(镇北社区社区) *Huayuan, Hefei (花园社区) *Duihe, Hefei(对河社区) *Paitou, Hefei(排头社区) *Dingguang, Hefei (定光社区) *Tangyang, Hefei (唐杨社区) *Guangtai, Hefei (光大社区) *Xishanyi, Hefei (西山驿社区) *Beitang, Hefei (陂塘社区) *Shuangqiao, Hefei (双桥社区) *Zhongxin, Hefei (中心社区) *Anhe, Hefei (安乐村) *Tanglinhuizumanzu Village (塘林回族满族村) *Huatanming, Hefei (花滩民族村) *Mahan, Hefei(马厂村) *Longxi, Hefei(龙西村) *Anji, Hefei(昂集村) *Jianshe, Hefei(建设村) *Yangwang, Hefei (杨王村) *Hepu, Hefei(合浦村) *Pangdian, Hefei (半店村) *Qunli, Hefei (群力村) *Da'an, Hefei (大安村) *Zhaogang, Hefei (赵岗村) *Yangba, Hefei (杨坝村) *Sangyuanheyixin, Hefei (桑园村和一心村 ==References== Category:Anhui
